data:item.name: FRDM K64 Click shield
data:item.display_title: A simple shield with two mikroBUS™ sockets for Click boards™ connectivity for NXP's FRDM-KL64F development platform
data:item.overview: FRDM-K64F Click shield is an extension for Freescale's FRDM-K64F development platform. It's a simple shield with two mikroBUS host sockets that allow you to interface more than 1531 different types of click boards with the Kinetis MK64FN1M0VLL12 MCU aboard FRDM-KL64Z. Quickly add functionalities like GSM, GPS, WiFi, ZigBee, Bluetooth, or thunder detection, proximity and color sensing and so on. The package includes two 1x8 headers, and single 1x10, and 1x6 headers.
